Article.ArticleTitle: The Role of Neutrophil Extracellular Traps (NETs) in the Pathogenesis of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus and Antiphospholipid Syndrome.

Abstract.AbstractText: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) is a systemic autoimmune disease of unknown aetiology [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Thromboinflammation, V.A. Nasonova Research Institute of Rheumatology, 115522 Moscow, Russia.
Department of Thromboinflammation, V.A. Nasonova Research Institute of Rheumatology, 115522 Moscow, Russia.
